verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye now what the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>; <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H7378>contend<s%> thou before the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and let the <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye, O <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H7379>controversy<s%>, and ye <S%H386>strong<s%> <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and he will <S%H3198>plead<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, what have I <S%H6213>done<s%> unto thee? and wherein have I <S%H3811>wearied<s%> thee? <S%H6030>testify<s%> against me.

For I brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> thee out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>servants<s%>; and I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%>.

O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H2142>remember<s%> now what <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3289>consulted<s%>, and what <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him from <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> unto <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>; that ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Wherewith shall I come <S%H6923>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3721>bow<s%> myself before the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>? shall I come <S%H6923>before<s%> him with burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, with <S%H5695>calves<s%> of a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>?

Will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>, or with ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>? shall I <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> for my <S%H6588>transgression<s%>, the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of my <S%H990>body<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>?

He hath <S%H5046>shewed<s%> thee, O <S%H120>man<s%>, what is <S%H2896>good<s%>; and what doth the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> of thee, but to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justly<s%>, and to <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6800>humbly<s%> with thy <S%H430>God<s%>?

The <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7121>crieth<s%> unto the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the man of <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: <S%H8085>hear<s%> ye the <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and who hath <S%H3259>appointed<s%> it.

¶ Are <S%H786>there<s%> yet the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H7562%H376>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and the <S%H7332>scant<s%> <S%H374>measure<s%> that is <S%H2194>abominable<s%>?
Shall I count them <S%H2135>pure<s%> with the <S%H7562>wicked<s%> <S%H3976>balances<s%>, and with the <S%H3599>bag<s%> of <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H68>weights<s%>?

For the rich <S%H6223>men<s%> thereof are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%>, and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Therefore also will I make thee <S%H2470>sick<s%> in <S%H5221>smiting<s%> thee, in making thee <S%H8074>desolate<s%> because of thy <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%>, but not be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>; and thy casting <S%H3445>down<s%> shall be in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee; and thou shalt take <S%H5253>hold<s%>, but shalt not <S%H6403>deliver<s%>; and that which thou <S%H6403>deliverest<s%> will I give <S%H5414>up<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H2232>sow<s%>, but thou shalt not <S%H7114>reap<s%>; thou shalt <S%H1869>tread<s%> the <S%H2132>olives<s%>, but thou shalt not <S%H5480>anoint<s%> thee with <S%H8081>oil<s%>; and sweet <S%H8492>wine<s%>, but shalt not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>.

¶ For the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> are <S%H8104>kept<s%>, and all the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%>, and ye <S%H3212>walk<s%> in their <S%H4156>counsels<s%>; that I should <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H8047>desolation<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof an <S%H8322>hissing<s%>: therefore ye shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.
